query:
SELECT 'Ciclos' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM cycles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Plantas', COUNT(*) FROM plants
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Registros Diários', COUNT(*) FROM dailyLogs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Registros Saúde', COUNT(*) FROM plantHealthLogs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Registros Tricomas', COUNT(*) FROM plantTrichomeLogs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Registros LST', COUNT(*) FROM plantLSTLogs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Receitas', COUNT(*) FROM recipes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Templates Tarefas', COUNT(*) FROM taskTemplates
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Tarefas Pendentes', COUNT(*) FROM taskInstances;
